Title: Assessment of Bidirectional Relationships Between Physical Activity and Depression Among Adults
Author: Choi et al
Study_Aim_Question: "...we apply bidirectional MR to assess the potential causal relationship of physical activity with the risk for depression, and vice versa." [@Assessment_Choi_2019]
Notes: UKBB Excluded from Outcome Cohort. rs7326482 removed as outlier in MR-PRESSO.

Title: GWAS of lifetime cannabis use reveals new risk loci, genetic overlap with psychiatric traits, and a causal effect of schizophrenia liability
Author: Pasman et al
Study_Aim_Question: "... to examine whether there was evidence for a causal relationship from cannabis use to schizophrenia risk, and from liability to schizophrenia to cannabis use."
Notes: Doesn't state which SNPs left out of final analysis, 109->102

Title: Genome Analyses of >200,000 Individuals Identify 58 Loci for Chronic Inflammation and Highlight Pathways that Link Inflammation and Complex Disorders
Author: Ligthart et al
Study_Aim_Question: "we conducted MR analyses to provide an improved understanding of the causal relation between CRP and several related clinical outcomes"

Title: Understanding the consequences of education inequality on cardiovascular disease: mendelian randomisation study
Author: Carter et al
Study_Aim_Question: "To investigate the role of body mass index (BMI), systolic blood pressure, and smoking behaviour in explaining the effect of education on the risk of cardiovascular disease outcomes"

Title: Obesity and Multiple Sclerosis: A Mendelian Randomization Study
Author: Mokry et al
Study_Aim_Question: "we elected to perform Mendelian randomization (MR) analyses to evaluate whether genetically increased BMI is associated with an increased risk of MS"

Title: The Role of Obesity, Type 2 Diabetes, and Metabolic Factors in Pancreatic Cancer: A Mendelian Randomization Study
Author: Carreras-Torres et al
Study_Aim_Question: "to investigate the causal relationship between these metabolic exposures and pancreatic cancer"
Notes: Overlap is % of Outcome Cohorts from Europe

Title: Causal Relationship Between Gut Microbiota and Autoimmune Diseases: A Two-Sample Mendelian Randomization Study
Author: Xu et al
Study_Aim_Question: "aiming to investigate the causal relationship between gut microbiota and a broad range of ADs, we conducted a comprehensive two-sample MR analysis of six ADs, including SLE, RA, IBD, MS, T1D, and CeD"

Title: Evidence of a causal relationship between body mass index and psoriasis: A mendelian randomization study
Author: Budu-Aggrey et al
Study_Aim_Question: "We aimed to investigate a possible causal relationship between body mass index (BMI) and psoriasis"

Title: The associations between modifiable risk factors and nonalcoholic fatty liver disease: A comprehensive Mendelian randomization study
Author: Xie et al
Study_Aim_Question: "We aimed to systematically explore the relationships between genetically predicted modifiable risk factors and NAFLD"

Title: Smoking and COVID-19 outcomes: an observational and Mendelian randomisation study using the UK Biobank cohort
Author: Clift et al
Study_Aim_Question: "we investigated associations between smoking and COVID-19 using both observational and Mendelian randomisation approaches"
